artist: Artist: George Cruikshank; Publisher: David Bogue, London
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Thirza J. Cleveland
portfolio: From Plate III from The Drunkard's Children (A Sequel to the Bottle), David Bogue, London
provenance: Thirza Cleveland, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1994.
title: From the Gin Shop to the Dancing Rooms, from the Dancing Rooms to the Gin Shop, the Poor Girl is Driven on in that Course which Ends in Misery and Woe
